column3: “it really makes the crap from the day melt away. nice to smoke some mixed with a little bubble and then just cuddle all night and such good sleep.  I have bad insomnia anxiety and depression with a little ptsd and traumatic brain injury. works for me and after about 30 minutes can still function.”

“Talk about some sticky-icky! Nice full buds with fruity undertones and hints of pine. Great cerebral high accompanied by a nice relaxing body high with a mellow euphoria as the kicker. 

Would highly recommend for both pain and pleasure.”

“Got this strain because I was smoking a lot of sativas to get rid of head aches and boy I proved to myself once again by doing that that I do not recommend sativas for any type of physical pain, such as head aches yes even head aches. 
SO 
The purple goo looks fibrous and dense but is actually a pretty light flower with good orange color hairs and not so crystaly. 

so the high was long and it hit you quick all m...”

“I have smoked very many strains but Purple goo by far is the  most potent strain I have ever consumed. Purple Goo is definitely for the experienced smoker, although it is an indica it will definitely alter the mind. Great Strain!”

“I had Purple Jah Goo so I don't know how different it is from Purple Goo. THE FLAVOR was amazing it tastes exactly like a purple jolly rancher. It is a nice thick but cool and smooth smoke. However, it isn't very strong. It is good for relaxation and it has excellent flavor but won't get you super stoned.”
“This is by far my favorite strain! haze pushes through my tolerance level
column4: and sometimes when I smoke it feels like I'm smoking for the first time. I can get real focused on a video game or show
column5: and be totally involved in it. Great strain to watch nature shows with :)"”"

column3: “If your looking to unwind and rid pain this is your strain! Purple Goo was a spontaneous buy last time I went into the dispensary and I was very pleased with my purchase! I personally prefer Sativa's but it's always nice to unwind with a nice Indica after a long day and melt into the couch! Smell, Tastes, and looks? 8/10 - High? 9/10 so overall i give it an 8.5/10. Would recommend medicinally for Insomnia, Stress, an...”

“I got this from a friend who got it from Burning Man and I was just floored by it. I was struck with how hazy and sluggish I felt within minutes. thinking was hard and I couldn't feel any of my limbs. definitely a good strain for anyone who wants to relieve pain or anxiety or just relax. i became very sleepy afterwards, so insomnia sufferers will like this. Any attempt I made to speak ended in just rambling which qui...”
“Purple Goo lives up to its rep.. awesome strain for relaxation and pain management.”

“A very strong strain, with sweet smell and soft smoke. It is veryuplifting  and euphoric. The buzz lasts for a very long time, and is a mixture of body high and head high, almost has a bit of mushroom-like effect. Very good choice for partying and social interaction, as well as meditation and spirituality.”

“I got this from a friend who got it from Burning Man and I was just floored by it. I was struck with how hazy and sluggish I felt within minutes. thinking was hard and I couldn't feel any of my limbs. definitely a good strain for anyone who wants to relieve pain or anxiety or just relax. i became very sleepy afterwards, so insomnia sufferers will like this. Any attempt I made to speak ended in just rambling which qui...”
“Smell was great, and it tasted amazing. I felt like my pain was washed away, defiantly gotta smoke again”

“I like it smells really good smooth smoke but burns my nose a little I like that does smell like lavender I'm getting a piney taste buds were nice n dense  wish who ever grew it would of left it under a bit would of loved to see more purple in it body feels very relaxed would try again for sure mouth is starting to dry up 10/10 for me”

“Definitely one of my top 5 strains. The oz I picked up was super sticky and dense. One of my favorite smokes for sure. Very relaxing and helps with my anxiety for hours to come unlike many other strains. It's absolutely loaded with resin. If you get a chance to try this weed don't pass it up.”
“Wonderful strain to exploit all its properties while working heavy labor either at work or in the yard.”

“If I ever wanted to feel like a puddle I'd go straight to this strain. I tried late at night and all my muscles slowly started becoming hard of hearing when I told them to move. I felt tranquilized. Mind quite foggy and body felt massaged by every expert since 1AD. This is my favorite straight india now.”

“If I ever wanted to feel like a puddle I'd go straight to this strain. I tried late at night and all my muscles slowly started becoming hard of hearing when I told them to move. I felt tranquilized. Mind quite foggy and body felt massaged by every expert since 1AD. This is my favorite straight india now.”
“Purple Goo lives up to its rep.. awesome strain for relaxation and pain management.”
“😊GREAT STRAIN,LOVE THE TEXTURE OF THE BUDS,THE SMELL JUST CALLS MY NAME,GREAT HIGH👍DEF IN MY TOP 5✅✅🔥🔥🔥”

“I like it smells really good smooth smoke but burns my nose a little I like that does smell like lavender I'm getting a piney taste buds were nice n dense  wish who ever grew it would of left it under a bit would of loved to see more purple in it body feels very relaxed would try again for sure mouth is starting to dry up 10/10 for me”
“i love it i need more of this give out a good smell and its very smooth.MARRY JANE THANK YOU"!”"

“I got this from a friend who got it from Burning Man and I was just floored by it. I was struck with how hazy and sluggish I felt within minutes. thinking was hard and I couldn't feel any of my limbs. definitely a good strain for anyone who wants to relieve pain or anxiety or just relax. i became very sleepy afterwards, so insomnia sufferers will like this. Any attempt I made to speak ended in just rambling which qui...”
“Great strain. smells sweet. smooth smoke, very relaxing. only downfall is it made me very hungry.”
“amazing wax !! love my indicas”
“Sticky goodness I love this strain”
“high quality indica strain minimal side effects other than dry eyes nice flowery berry smell and taste and beautiful purple buds”

“This stuff is great. The nuggets are tight and dense and make good kief. Instant relief of pain, anxiety upon smoking with a calming euphoric bliss. Very peaceful high that is good at the end of the day to unwind into your night. I have to get more of this stuff soon. Try it out”
“extremely potent stuff, hit me almost instantly and lasted a damn long time”
“very nice body high great for nighttime and just to chill very strong body high not so frosty but very dense nugs usually”
“purple goo has a few different names so watch out for those imposters Lol, but the Goo is a great indica this flower is a great night smoke it helps put you to sleep. 10/10”

“Large, dark nugs with a few orange hairs. Smell is sweet and earthy with a strong undertone of pine and fuel. Tastes decidedly piney with a harsh earthy, sour exhale.
The high starts quickly-in under 2 minutes. It’s super relaxing with solid pain relief and a mild head buzz. Not spacey but certainly introspective and care free. You’ll want to snack so have munchies on hand.
This is a functional indica, ideal for a la...”
“this is one I'm going to get again I really like this goo it's on point!!! at the haha not going to tell.”

“picked up some of this stuff the other day and wasnt sure what to expect being that everyone says what they have is real but this stuff was THE REAL DEAL!! super caked out, purple and sticky nugs! true indica traits started to show as my body became fantastically numb while also feeling euphoric. this appealed to my sativa favoring personality. smells like blueberries too!!! definitely in my top 3 indicas TOP SHELF! ...”

“Purchased and used to make Hash Oil and was very pleased with the amount of Oil produced, 11%-13% yield. Oil had a very potent and noticeable body high. Felt Motivated and Positive, effects lasted 2-3 hours Very Relaxed and Uplift uplifting Overall”
“Tastes and smells like lemon.”
“This is an excellent strain, my friends. Mix it with some OG KUSH and you're set!”

“very purple. very moist. she's gorgeous upon first sight. bitch feels velvety. smells like grape bubble yum & when smoked(organic hemp paper) she taste like sweet berry iced tea. perfect indica... one of top 3 purples out hands down”

“Odd name because the flavor of the smoke doesn't match the name. That is my only real quirky complaint about an otherwise fine product. Upon inhalation you will experience a light to moderate warm peppery taste with an extremely light aftertaste of berry. Cerebral effects are almost immediate. With effort you can get a whole body buzz. I find this one to work well when I need to do my chores or anything where creativ...”
“Great strain, Nice smell and look. Nice high but doesn't last to long. Good tasting flower though.”
“This batch of Goo was very heavy good quality and very purple with good buzz high.”

“Super sticky, resionus purple! Amazing Thc count! Sweet skunk aroma. Burns at a high rate of flame due to its copious amounts of resion. Slightly smooth with hints of purple, Purple Goo well please just about anyone who comes across it. Very relaxing, purple high...”
“Amazing strain! A few rips is all you need. It'll definitely knock you out if you over indulge. Great colors and awesome flavors. The smell is incredible. A must try.”
“very very impressed the look is awesome the taste is awesome the smell the feel all in all it is awesome!!!!”
“Craazzy had me trippin after 7 bowls fo about 2 an a half hour wayyy to high to drive couldn't do anything way strong”
“Super delicious ! Great strain that surely does not disappoint. !”

“Here I go with favoring a purple strain again... This strain took purple kush to a higher level. If you like purple kush you need to try this one! The smell and taste to this strain left a strong  berry-cheesy flavor and pine smell. The overwhelming euphoria, body tingling, numbing feeling you get is great. Pain and stress melt away with the feeling of going to bed. I would buy this again!”
“Nice smell, packs a punch”
“I love purple Goo, so high so functional, so chill, euphoric tastes like candy, great for movies and munchies. This and White Russian are my favorite strains”
“It gets you really chill and energetic at the same time I think, I buy this weed all the time, taste good AF and smells tropical”
“Just got some and it's amazing”
“Great strain, hits good, tasty. Very nice high, i defiantly suggest smoking it in at bong at the car wash aha, speed smoke it with another person or two and get blitzed quick.”
“I agree with all the review results, how ever mine was convection vaped herb.  Would be way interested in a concentrate.”
“Purple cheese are awesome! It's help to reduced tired as sleepy. Also it's good stuff and pretty good to be relaxing and reduced stress. I would love to buy it as much as i can!”
“Best tasting strain I've ever consumed.”
“an immediate uplifting cerebral effect followed by a very relaxing body high”
